page.title: 12TRAFFIC CONDITIONS LEADENHAM
page.content: The A17 passing through Leadenham is a vital road link from the industrial areas of the North and Midlands to the East Coast ports.The road is also an important trading route between the agricultural areas of Lincolnshire and East Anglia,the North and the Midlands.It also carries a high volume of holiday traffic to the East Coast resorts,such as Skegness.Traffic has increased considerably,especially with the growth of European Trade.Residents of Leadenham have put up with much noise,dirt,pollution and fumes and run the risk of injury from heavy traffic.Listed and other buildings are at risk of damage from vibration and collision.Drivers are subject to dangers and delays due to the effects of steep hills,tight bends,junctions and roadside developments.Many accidents are recorded.
